title: Adding Application Tiles to Your Dashboard
content:
There are some tools you might use in your day-to-day that are not yet integrated with Okta. You can still add the application as a custom tile to your dashboard. You can even auto-launch the application in your web browser each time you log into Okta. Hereâ€™s how you can do so with Simpli.fi Looker, for example: [Image]
